login.title: Der Benutzer meldet sich an
login.welcome: Gerne können Sie auf Anfrage mehr erfahren

labels.enter.password: Geben Sie das Kennwort ein, das mit der E-Mail
labels.reset.password: Eine Kennwortrücksetznachricht wird an Ihre E-Mail-Adresse gesendet.

messages.reset.instruction: Instructions for resetting your password have been sent to your email address.
messages.enter.valid.email: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
messages.dialog.token.expired: This link is no longer valid. Click Ok to request a new link.
messages.required.one.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase character.
messages.required.one.upparcase: Password must contain at least one uppercase character.
messages.required.one.digit: Password must contain at least one digit.
messages.required.one.punctuation: Password must contain at least one punctuation character or punctuation mark.
messages.min.length: Password must be at least 8 characters in length.
messages.pwd.change.validity: Password may only be changed in 24 hours from the last change.
messages.no.history.pwd: Password must not match last 13 passwords.
messages.no.username.pwd: Password must not contain your username.
